page.title: 11ABERDEEN: SPORT
page.content:
SPORT IN ABERDEEN.
Aberdeen is particulary well off as far as sports facilities are concerned many of which are in our area.
For the athlete we have Linksfield Stadium (close to the Aberdeen F.C. ground) and within the university grounds, a cricket pitch, squash court, and a swimming pool. Linksfield Community Complex can offer a gymnasium with wait training equipment, and a pool ideal for the learner.
Moving towards the beach there is the Links golf course - owned by the Council - and various 'novelty' games like crazy golf and putting.
